name: Cassandra
tagline: Installs Cassandra, DataStax Agent & OpsCenter on RHEL/Ubuntu/Debian.
body:
# Overview
This is a Puppet module for installing Cassandra by DataStax.

# Links

* https://forge.puppetlabs.com/locp/cassandra
* https://github.com/locp/cassandra
